summary: The Glenmore Hotel offers panoramic views of Sydney Harbour and the city skyline. Established in 1921, it boasts a rich history and a rooftop bar perfect for enjoying the sunset.

details.heading: The Glenmore Hotel
details.content:
Established in 1921, The Glenmore Hotel boasts a rich history and a rooftop bar perfect for enjoying the sunset.

  • Panoramic views of Sydney Harbour
  • Classic pub atmosphere
  • Rooftop bar

Learn more on our website.
